alert.note: Alert for Barren; Metcalfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:41PM EST until January 01 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN BARREN AND NORTHERN METCALFE COUNTIES... At 1241 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Glasgow, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Barren and northern Metcalfe Counties, including the following locations... Wisdom, Clarks Corner, Echo, Cork, Node, Coral Hill, Knob Lick, Beechville, Slick Rock and Savoyard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL...<.75IN WIND...70MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central and central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
